body_html:
@cwhipkey
I guess I could optimize it by multi-thread shard, should I do it for in this PR?
And I am not sure whether I need to modify the BUILD script, because I add two files namely diag_op.h and diag_op_gpu.cu.cc.

Thank you very much.

body:
@cwhipkey 
I guess I could optimize it by multi-thread shard, should I do it for in this PR?
And I am not sure whether I need to modify the BUILD script, because I add two files namely diag_op.h and diag_op_gpu.cu.cc. 

Thank you very much.
